name: Streetwise Horticulture
text:
Today I learned/ How a window blooms:

/ Where an elbow strikes/ Glass,/ The pane cracks.

/ It splits to/ Sprout/ In a loud collapse,

/ Flowers fast/ In a curb collision.

/ A thousand and one/ Cube-cut petals/ Spread to shine/ Translucent blue,

/ Scatter bright/ To dot the pavement./
